facetAddress(bytes4).details: If facet is not found return address(0).

facetAddress(bytes4).notice: Gets the facet that supports the given selector.

facetAddresses().notice: Get all the facet addresses used by a diamond.

facets().notice: Gets all facet addresses and their four byte function selectors.
